pin.title: มาร์ท ธนภูมิ #GenMentorJSD เมนเทอร์สายเทคฯ ผู้ปูทางผู้เรียนสู่อาชีพใหม่
pin.description: I have the interview opportunity about what/why I keep mentoring and coaching. What are the mindset behind each actions and so on

items.title: GenMentor#5
items.description: I have been selected to be GenMentor in JSD#5 with expertise in Software engineering fields. The role is responsible for coaching and mentoring mentees including consulting the career path for career switchers in the technology industry.

items.title: GenMentor#4
items.description: I have been selected to be GenMentor in JSD#4 with expertise in Software engineering fields. The role is responsible for coaching and mentoring mentees including consulting the career path for career switchers in the technology industry.

items.title: GenMentor#3
items.description: I'm a mentor in GenTH JSD#3 with expertise in Software engineering fields. Coaching, and mentoring mentees with consulting for career paths in the technology industry.

items.title: Software Engineer - Backend & DevOps
items.description: I'm in a development & operation role at WellSign Team of Accenture Thailand. WellSign is a mobile application project to support people with hearing disabilities in Thailand by representing as an E-Learning application about Thai's sign language.
